description: Trystan Bull is a man in pain.  He's admitted himself to a strange, rural hospital where the staff is rookie and the care is... full service.His nurse is a boy called Keylan O'Connor.  When Trystan explains to Keylan the nature of his injury, Keylan inspects the hurt knee in a manner that suggests to Trystan the boy has no medical training at all.  The truth is Keylan's not a registered nurse.  In fact he couldn't tell a femur from a lemur.  But there is one kind of bone he's familiar with.  He's showing Trystan that the best medicine is always a soft mouth around the large, hard cock of the patient.  And once Trystan wises up to the type of unorthodox methods this 'hospital' is practicing, he's not letting young Keylan leave until he eases Trystan's pain.  Enjoy!
title: Nursing The Wounded
